summary: This is an email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) containing a list of press clips from July 24, 2020. The clips include news articles about a judge ruling to unseal records in Ghislaine Maxwell's defamation case and a political video targeting Trump's comments about Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of news articles regarding a judge's ruling to unseal records in her defamation case and mentioned in a political video targeting Trump.

events.title: Judge rules to unseal records in Maxwell defamation case
events.description: A judge ruled to unseal records in the defamation case involving Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: A judge ruled on July 24, 2020, to unseal records in Ghislaine Maxwell's defamation case.
The Lincoln Project released a political video on July 24, 2020, targeting Trump's comments about Ghislaine Maxwell.
The document is an internal email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York distributing press clips.
